    crops.core.rescodes module¶

    fastachains(fasta_seq)[source]¶
    ressymbol(name)[source]¶

    Conversion from residue 3-letter symbol to 1-letter symbol.

    Parameters

    name (str) – Residue symbol (3-letter convention) or Nucleotide symbol (1,2-letter convention).

    Return oneletter

    Residue/Nucleotide symbol (1-letter convention).

    Rtype oneletter

    str
